description:
To round off our series of six talks around "Continuous Delivery" we are bringing together some of the Speakers in an hour-long Expert Clinic Fishbowl.

**
The six Talks were :
Dave Farley - The Rationale for Continuous Delivery
Lyndsay Prewer - Smoothing the Continuous Delivery Path: a tale of two architectures
Steve Smith - Measuring Continuous Delivery
Ben Conrad - How their digital tax platform has supported the rapid launch of Covid-19 services at HMRC
Stuart Gunter - Secure Continuous Delivery
Lisa Crispin - A Whole Team Approach to Quality in Continuous Delivery

**
You can see details (and recordings) of all these Talks at www.equalexperts.com/expert-talks
**
Join us and put your questions to these Continuous Delivery Experts!
**
title: Expert Clinic:  Fishbowl discussion on the subject of Continuous Delivery
